steps.name: user click on the computer-tablet icon
Scroll the apple from the filter area and click the checkbox
Scroll to screen size and select screen size
Find the highest priced item and click on it
The product price is memorized before adding to cart
Click on the Add to Cart button and click on the Go to Cart button on the screen that opens.
Check that the product price recorded in the TempData variable is equal to the product price in the Cart.
